@fmassa If I got it correctly, you mean the function like sum() will be rewritten by using TensorIterator which would be much faster ?

Currently, this line also makes my policy gradient evaluation phase extremely slow on discrete control tasks compared with continuous ones (with Normal)

body:
@fmassa If I got it correctly, you mean the function like `sum()` will be rewritten by using `TensorIterator` which would be much faster ? 

Currently, [this line](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/distributions/categorical.py#L50) also makes my policy gradient evaluation phase extremely slow on discrete control tasks compared with continuous ones (with `Normal`)
